Text:
I wrote this guide for anyone looking to start playing NL hold em online, its how to get free money from poker rooms such as full tilt. a friend of mine named it the "bonus whore" method.

NOTE: Bonus whoring only works for people that arent allready members on full tilt.

First sign up at fulltiltpoker(dot]com

IMPORTANT: Use bonus code PF888

Full? tilt will pay you double your money, up to $600 upon first deposit.

if you need anymore help just send a message my way
